targets.expr: avg(container_spec_cpu_quota{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"} / 100000 or vector(0))

avg(avg(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)
  /
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)
  * 100
) by (pod)
and 
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod) > 0)

avg(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m]) * 100) by (container)

avg(container_spec_cpu_quota{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"} / 100000) by (container)

avg(container_spec_cpu_quota{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"} / 100000) by (container)

  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)
  /
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)

) by (pod)
and

avg(

  /
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container)
  * 100
) by (container)
and 
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container) > 0

avg(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)
  /
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod)

) by (pod)
and 
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod) > 0

avg(
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container)
  /
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container)

avg(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m])) by (container)

avg((rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m]) / rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", container=~"$app.*", container=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m])) * 100) by (container)

rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m]) / rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="data-k8s-cadvisor", pod=~"$app.*", pod=~".+", namespace=~"$namespace", image!="registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9", id=~"(.*)cri-containerd(.*)"}[1m])
